name: PHASEOccluder
desc: An object with a shape and position that blocks audio from reaching the listener.

items.name: init(engine: PHASEEngine, shapes: [PHASEShape])
items.desc: Creates an occluder with the given engine and shapes.

items.name: var shapes: [PHASEShape]
items.desc: An array of shapes that collectively define the occluder's audio-deflecting surface and texture.
